titleStmt.title: A bundle of myrrhe. Or Several sweet truths spiritually unfolded under these following heads. 1. Mercy magnified. 2. Practical graces. 3. Christs humiliation. 4. Certainty of salvation. Published by H.P. minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Prime, H.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by R.I. for Livewell Chapman, and are to be sold at his shop at the Crown in Popes-head-alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
